title: Machine Learning Engineer
description:
Job Description:
We are seeking a skilled Machine Learning Engineer with 3–5 years of experience to join our team. In this role, you will design, build, and deploy ML models to solve real-world problems, optimize workflows, and contribute to scalable AI solutions. You will collaborate with data scientists, software engineers, and product teams to turn data into actionable insights and production-grade applications.

Responsibilities:

Design, train, and deploy machine learning models for production use.

Preprocess and analyze large datasets from diverse sources.

Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define ML-driven solutions.

Optimize models for performance, scalability, and efficiency.

Maintain and monitor deployed models, ensuring reliability and accuracy.

Stay updated with the latest ML/AI research, tools, and frameworks.

Qualifications:

Bachelor’s/Master’s in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field.

3–5 years of professional experience in ML/AI projects.

Proficiency in Python and ML libraries (TensorFlow, PyTorch, Scikit-learn).

Strong background in data structures, algorithms, and statistics.

Hands-on experience with model deployment (e.g., Flask, FastAPI, Docker).

Familiarity with cloud platforms (AWS, GCP, or Azure).

Good communication and problem-solving skills.
